body.p: The mean of each probability distribution pictured is 5. Which has the largest standard deviation?

response.feedback: Correct. This distribution has the largest spread relative to the mean, with higher relative frequencies further from the mean than the other distributions.
Incorrect. This distribution has the second largest standard deviation. Look for a distribution with a lower relative frequency near the mean and higher relative frequencies further from the mean.
Incorrect. This distribution has the third largest standard deviation. Look for a distribution with the lowest relative frequency near the mean and higher relative frequencies further from the mean.
Incorrect. This distribution has the smallest standard deviation. It has the highest relative frequency near the mean, which makes the standard deviation small.
